attributes.description: DEMO SALE.....This vehicle has a balance of a 4 year 120 000km warranty which expires on 25 May 2026 whichever comes first, and also a balance of a 6 year 9 000km service plan which also expires on 25 May 2028.Features include: air con, 6 speed manual, connect to touch radio, multi-function Steering, Blue tooth, Diff Lock, remote key, central locking, power steering, traction control, 2 USB ports, 2 12V sockets, electric windows, Alloy wheels, running boards, sports bar, tow bar.  Trade ins appreciated, finance facilities available and deliveries arranged nationwide
